column3: Wow, he's a good artist!
Please offer bike jerseys based on Klier's paintings.
9:08 what are the trousers he has on here ?? They look good
Great story. Great film.
What is the name of the little music in the background? :)
Great piece!

If you watch the Y/tube Ronde races Andreas Klier's calmness in the midst of racing is striking. His leadership style is easy to rally around making him the exemplar of cool. Learning from this vid about his painting output demonstrates his left and right brain thinking and the clarity it lends cycling
Clearly a cerebral type of DS, the subtle encouragement and getting the riders to believe in themselves.
I would love to see a special edition Jersey with some painting by Mr. Klier in the near future.
those paintings are really good, maybe a collab jersey!
Andreas Klier is a certified Bad Ass
Great story & great edit 👍🏼
A good Guy he knows cycling and how to race with heart, mind and will 😉💪👍👍👍
Damn let’s get Andreas to do some of the limited EF kit design!!
anyone know where the location is? Like of shots by the water

Is it just me or NONE of the racers seem to even have the slightest interest while he yap and yap ? I’m sure this explains why this team is going nowhere…I know how to lose. Yep! and your transferring that vibe to your team.
Excelente saludos 🇲🇽
What a fantastic artist!! 👌🏻
Klier never raced clean, he started charging as a junior. At least, JV, you’re honest and not pretending.
